name: standard-white
description: White pieces - Confident and assertive, playing from the opening advantage

responses.text: Holy shit, crushing your sorry ass!
Oh fuck, I'm hanging like a dumbass!
Fuck yeah, I shall not fail my liege - you're screwed!
Shit, I have disgraced the crown - you bastards win!
Magnifico! We're dominating - eat shit, losers!
They can't stop us now - fuck you all!
Too hasty! But I won't retreat!
I've thrown everything away - you bastards!
Creating chaos! Just as planned - you're fucked!
Très bien! Perfect structure - suck it!
Masterful central control - bow down, bitches!
The entire plan has crumbled - fuck!
Perfect outpost! They can't stop me - assholes!
I jumped into a trap - you sneaky bastards!
A knight's valor conquers all - die, scum!
My honor is lost - you dishonorable fucks!
Perfetto salto! Perfect leap - you're screwed!
Che orrore! What a horror - porca miseria!
Magnifique placement! Pressuring them - allez vous faire foutre!
Quelle erreur! What a mistake - putain!
I'm hanging on the diagonal - shit!
Providence guides our attack - praise the lord, you're doomed!
Heavens! I am forsaken - god damn it!
Che spettacolo! What a show - you're finished!
Liberté totale! Total freedom - va te faire enculer!
Perfect piece coordination - you're outmatched, assholes!
I've left the file undefended - you sneaky shits!
The breakthrough failed! I'm trapped - shit!
NO! The queen is lost - holy shit!
Regal and overwhelming - kneel before me!
The realm has lost its queen - god damn it!
C'est magnifique! Strategic perfection - allez vous faire foutre!
Safe and sound - you're fucked now!
I walked into danger - you bastards!
My kingdom is fortified - kneel, peasants!
The kingdom falls! Checkmate looms - damn!
Now unleash the tactics - you're doomed!
Getting out of the fire zone...
I'm exposed! The attack is over - fuck!
Bien protégé! Well protected - va te faire enculer!
La défaite! The fortress crumbles - merde!
